Help

General

Use Ctrl+Shift+Z to open the popup (or Command+Shift+Z on a Mac).

YouTube

  • The extension controls the first tab of the current window
  • Use Space key to play/pause, use < > to go to the previous/next song
  • If you won't have the option to go back (e.g. you are using "Autplay" option instead of a playlist), > will go back in the browser history if what you have played in that tab
